## Welcome to R-DAVIS

**R for Data Analysis & Visualization in Science**

Please see the [**Syllabus**](syllabus.html) tab for complete course information, or check the [**Outline**](outline.html) tab for the course schedule.

This graduate-level course provides training in data science with R, focusing on reproducible research practices and practical skills for ecological data analysis.
